title: Kid's & Music
content:
Hello everyone,

I am working on a logo project for an non-profit organization that will help less fortunate people (mostly children) have musical instruments to learn on. Any ideas on a font or fonts that may have the feelings of children and/or music would be greatly appreciated.

Thank you in advance,

Duncan Robertson

 [‹ Beautiful way for monogram "SN"?](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519014736/http:/www.typophile.com/node/21448 "Go to previous forum topic") [Neutra use examples ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080519014736/http:/www.typophile.com/node/21343 "Go to next forum topic")
author: duncan
